name: Wrap The Rope!
description:
Let's enjoy the tension release game Touch blocks with ropes and make a circle of ropes around the dots.

You have just spin the rope with soft touch and collect same color circles. After completing first level drag the rope and circled different color blocks. Enjoy construction truck with spin rope, wrap the blocks with rope by moving the truck.

Tap the screen to move the wrap rope in puzzle rope game. Relaxing puzzle rope game is classic art to release tension. Fun for puzzle lovers because gives a real spin of rope by drag on the screen. You have seen construction trucks use for transporting and as a cargo. But in this spin rope game use differently make circle around blocks as like net. Its look simple but tough to complete the level in one time, A little mistake make failed before starting wrap first make sense how to move the construction truck.


Features of Wrap the Rope:
Multi color blocks to wrap them
Real color rope with solving puzzle
Spin around the pool with kids truck sim
Fun for both kids and youngsters
